thread.title: Caitlyn Watches Movie While Lamar Is In Death bed
thread.title_full: Caitlyn Watches Movie While Lamar Is In Death bed

title: Caitlyn Watches Movie While Lamar Is In Death bed
text:
Caitlyn Watches Movie While Lamar Is In Death bed Written by: Chaitra Published: Monday, October 19, 2015, 18:00 [IST] 
According to Daily Mail's reports, Caitlyn Jenner was spotted in a movie theater dolled up , while Lamar is still lying critical in the Hospital. 
Caitlyn Jenner, who was popularly known for the Athlete she was, before her transition, and also former husband of the queen of Kardashians, has been having her lady fun amidst the Lamar Odom's medical condition. 
Image Courtesy: Daily Mail 
The transgender female reality star has stayed away from the family since she came out to the world as Caitlyn. 
While the entire Kardashian family is by Lamar's side in the hospital, with the cameras still rolling and make up on, Caitlyn hasn't paid a visit to the hospital yet. 
Neither was she heard talking about the whole situation. Khloe has been with Lamar the whole time and strongly believes in his recovery. 
Caitlyn Jenner, then Bruce Jenner played a very important role as a father during Khloe's wedding to Lamar. Having always been such a prominent figure in their relationship, it's quite surprising to know that she has pulled herself away from the issue. 
One of the reasons behind Caitlyn's this sort of a behavior towards Lamar could be the clash she has with Khloe regarding the statement she had made about Kris Jenner in the Vanity Fair interview. 
Caitlyn looked utterly stunning at the movie theater premises in her skinny pants, a bling top, clutch in the hand and nails well painted in red! 
Didn't seem like Lamar's critical medical condition matters to her one bit or she might be refraining herself from making any comments post her clash with Khloe. 
While Caitlyn was enjoying her movie time with her new bestie and assistant, the rest of the Kardashians dropped all the work they were involved with and rushed to the hospital upon hearing Lamar's improvement. 
''As a family we've decided to hold off on publishing content across our apps while we continue to support and pray for Lamar,'' they said. ''Thank you for your kindness and understanding during this difficult time. " 
We can only wait till the new season of KUWTK is aired to see if the family really stopped the camera from rolling all the life and death drama. And ohh, also, if we could get a glimpse of make up free Kardashians in the hospital at least!
